collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (9 total Queries, 9 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `pay`.*, `b`.`bill_type`, CONCAT(p.first_name, " ", COALESCE(p.middle_name, ""), " ", p.last_name) as patient_name, COALESCE(pay.payment_date, DATE(pay.created_at)) as display_date FROM `payments` `pay` LEFT JOIN `bills` `b` ON `b`.`id` = `pay`.`bill_id` LEFT JOIN `patients` `p` ON `p`.`id` = `b`.`patient_id` ORDER BY `pay`.`created_at` DESC LIMIT 10

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `pay`.*, `b`.`bill_type`, CONCAT(p.first_name, " ", COALESCE(p.middle_name, ""), " ", p.last_name) as patient_name, COALESCE(pay.payment_date, DATE(pay.created_at)) as display_date FROM `payments` `pay` LEFT JOIN `bills` `b` ON `b`.`id` = `pay`.`bill_id` LEFT JOIN `patients` `p` ON `p`.`id` = `b`.`patient_id` ORDER BY `pay`.`created_at` DESC LIMIT 10
